
# Advanced QR Code Generator

An all-in-one webpage for generating custom QR codes. Supports **vCard**, **Link/Text**, and **WiFi** inputs with customizable options, detailed vCard fields, and a mobile-friendly interface.

---

## üöÄ Demo  
Check out the live demo: [https://parsafarshadfar.github.io/qr_code/](https://parsafarshadfar.github.io/qr_code/)




![qr_code_example]([https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/46465419/399976799-efb97a7e-dc6e-45b8-b31e-19403c8ca414.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..OQPMUk27AXRhhXmcHN7NkRBNo9mtI9tYyW5f90K1lYE](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/46465419/402373493-ab244ba8-ef9f-4000-a17d-a8d276925732.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..QGn8U4EK2bmxahMvwo1Dp8va8TdOyu9YUmo5UxHntXI))

---
## ‚ú® Features

1. **üìá Three Content Types**
   - **vCard**: Input name, phone(s), fax, company, job title, detailed address (street, city, state, postal code, country), and website all together in one QR code.
   - **üîó Link/Text**: Create QR codes for Web URLs, Email addresses or short text.
   - **üì∂ WiFi**: Generate a QR code to store network SSID, encryption type, and password.

2. **üé® Customizable QR Code**
   - Set **QR foreground color** and **background color**.
   - Choose **Error Correction Level** (Low, Medium, Q, H).

3. **üíæ Downloadable QR Codes**
   - Save generated QR codes as PNG files with a single click.

---

Contributions are welcome! If you have ideas for new features or improvements, feel free to open an issue or submit a pull request.
